title: Two Old Judges for Sale or Trade SOLD
author: kkkkandp

posts.post_title: Two Old Judges for Sale or Trade SOLD
posts.post_content:
I've got two decent Old Judges available for trade or sale.

1887 card of Fogarty is off-center from left to right and has a blob from the manufacturing process that partially obscures his name on the name/position/team line. Otherwise is in nice shape - good image, no back damage. $150sold

1889 card of Faatz is a nice image, well centered, and well graded. He is referred to as "Captain" in both the name/position/team line at the bottom and the hand-written info in the image. No back damage. $275sold

$400 for the pair. 

Would gladly entertain trades for similarly conditioned Old Judge cards of players I do not already have. 

Email me at [url]kkkkandp@aol.com[/url].
